knimeNode.name: Log Visualization
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node shows the possible views for event log, including TraceVariant, and LogProjection.

fullDescription.intro: This nodes creates several views to explore the event logs. Current visualizations include: Log Trace View and Dotted Chart View. The Log Trace View shows the event log in trace variants. The Dotted Chart View allows the interaction with users to show the dotted chart with different axis settings.
